oop.tema3.engine

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • oop.tema3.engine.Configuration

  • public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Botarleanu Robert-Mihai A Configuration class for the game of life. Will contain the border mode: borderless or bordered, as well as the rendering speed and cell configuration.
